When a system is vibrating in a normal mode,

answers.a: All masses move with the same Amplitude and same Frequency
answers.b: All masses move with the same Amplitude and different Frequency
answers.c: All masses move with different Frequency but of same phase
answers.d: All masses move with the same frequency and maintain a fixed phase relation

questions.question: A mass of 0.5 kg is suspended in a vertical plane by a spring having a stiffness coefficient of 300 N/m. The mass is displaced vertically downward from its static equilibrium position through a distance of 0.01m . Find the natural frequency of the system.
